long_description: The REI Stretch Belt for men has just a hint of stretch so you can feel comfortable and secure throughout days of adventure or everyday errands. Polyester fabric includes built-in stretch; plastic buckle holds belt at desired length. Belt measures 44 in. long, not including stretch.
short_description: The REI Stretch Belt for men has just a hint of stretch so you can feel comfortable and secure throughout days of adventure or everyday errands.
